description: In this course students learn about effectively integrating technology into classroom instruction. This course meets for three evening sessions in a computer laboratory setting. Students are required to take this course concurrently with EDUC 330. P/N only. Offered each semester.
name: Standards and Technology
notes: Open to Juniors and Seniors only.
Class will only meet on March 2, 9, and 16.

revisions.notes: Open to Juniors and Seniors only. Taken concurrently with EDUC 330.

revisions.description: In this course students learn how to integrate technology into classroom instruction. This course meets for three evening sessions in a computer laboratory setting. Students are required to take this course concurrently with EDUC 330. P/N only. Offered each semester.
